target: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_SEQ_00<tab>宝杖通りのフレモンダンは、ロリスの身を案じているようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_SEQ_01<tab>Fremondain tells you that the armory of House Jervaint has fallen out of repair. He has enlisted your services to restore the family's finery. Of immediate concern is Baroness Laurisse's cuirass, which is rusted, dented, and falling apart. However, Fremondain realizes suddenly that his mistress may be wearing it on some ill-conceived adventure to the north of Falcon's Nest even as you speak. Fremondain may be worried for nothing, but he nevertheless asks you to ensure no harm befalls his mistress.
target: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_SEQ_01<tab>フレモンダンに、ロリスの武具の世話を頼まれた。クルザス西部高地のファルコンネスト北にいる「ロリス」を探し、話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_SEQ_02<tab>You find the baroness healthy. The same cannot be said for the cutpurses tied up nearby. After a bit of conversation, you learn that the daughter of House Jervaint was patrolling the area in search of the wanted men in order to earn a bit of coin. However, during the scuffle, the rivets holding Baroness Laurisse's cuirass together broke, rendering the armor useless. Inform Fremondain of his mistress's safety─and her cuirass's demise─at the Jeweled Crozier.
target: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_SEQ_02<tab>ロリスは募兵に応じて危険な任務を請け負い、鎧を壊してしまっていた。イシュガルドの宝杖通りにいる「フレモンダン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_SEQ_03<tab>Fremondain is dismayed to learn of Baroness Laurisse's cuirass. It is his mistress's only suit of armor─how can she enter the grand tournament without it? He bids you repair it by fashioning three high-quality mythrite rivets to reattach the otherwise sound plates together.
target: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_SEQ_03<tab>フレモンダンに報告した。ロリスが来たる上覧試合で勝利するためには、やはり着慣れた鎧が必要なようだ。修繕に必要な部品「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F230F001 /var>」を3つ製作し、「フレモンダン」に納品しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_SEQ_04Fremondain gladly accepts the mythrite rivets, and praises the craftsmanship. Alas, his compliments will have to serve as payment until the fortunes of House Jervaint change─as they may very well do in the grand tournament.

※The next blacksmith quest will be available from Fremondain upon reaching level 55.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_SEQ_04フレモンダンにを納品した。壊れた鎧は、無事に修繕できそうだ。これからも彼の依頼に応え、上覧試合での勝利をめざすロリスを支援していこう。

※鍛冶師のレベルが55以上になると、宝杖通りのフレモンダンから次の鍛冶師クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Laurisse to the north of Falcon's Nest.
target: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_TODO_00<tab>ファルコンネスト北のロリスと話す
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_TODO_01<tab>イシュガルドのフレモンダンに報告

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Forge mythrite rivets <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the mythrite rivets <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Fremondain)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F230F001 /var>を製作)) ((フレモンダンに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F230F001 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_000<tab>A pleasant <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((afternoon)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. I trust you are well rested? Good, good. Well, to business: milady's armory is in a pitiful state.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_000おお、鍛冶師どの！
私、少し気になっていることがございましてな。
……実はロリスお嬢様の武具が、ずいぶんと傷んでおるのです。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_001<tab>Take her cuirass─the plates are sturdy, but the joints have rusted. The fault is ours for not taking better care of it, but if it falls apart while my mistress is fighting...
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_001先立つものがなく、修理を怠ったせいなのですが、
特に鎧には相当なガタが……。
戦いの最中に壊れでもしたら、事でございます！

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_002<tab>Yet she cares not! In fact, she is going out to train all the more often now that the grand tourney draws near.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_002しかるに近ごろのロリス様は、来たる上覧試合にそなえ、
ふらりと、武者修行にお出かけになることが増えまして……。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_003<tab>Just the other day, I thought her resting, only to find a note saying she had gone beastkin hunting near Falcon's Nest. Alone! She even said she would do it again, further north!
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_003この間も、てっきり宿で休んでおられると思いきや、
「魔物退治にゆく」との書き置きを残して、
ひとり、ファルコンネストくんだりまで向かわれました。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_004<tab>Good gods, and what if she has gone today? She could be in terrible danger! And of all the times─I cannot leave the shop to look for her!
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_004次はもっと北に行きたい、ともおっしゃっていたような……？
このフレモンダン、大変イヤな予感がしてまいりました！
……しかし、この忌々しい副業は、当分片づきそうもありませぬ。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_005<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, you are an adventurer, yes? Then please─find her! Find her now!
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_005聞けば鍛冶師どのは、冒険者としてもご高名なお方とか！
クルザス西部高地、「ファルコンネスト」北までご足労いただき、
ロリス様と会えましたら、武具周りの世話をお願いできませぬか？

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_010<tab>Perhaps I am unduly worried, but...could you look for the baroness all the same? She may have gone north of Falcon's Nest.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_010聞けば鍛冶師どのは、冒険者としてもご高名なお方とか！
クルザス西部高地、「ファルコンネスト」北までご足労いただき、
ロリス様と会えましたら、武具周りの世話をお願いできませぬか？

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_020<tab>Who... Oh, the smith? Why are you here? Ah. Of course, the steward <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> send someone.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_020あなた、たしか鍛冶師の……どうしてここに？
さてはじいに頼まれて、様子を見にきたのね？

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_021<tab>He need not fret so. House Durendaire wanted for blades. I gladly volunteered─this patrol earns me money and experience both.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_021心配には及ばないわ。
デュランデル家の騎兵団が募兵していたから、
腕試しがてら、哨戒任務を志願したのよ。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_022<tab>Nor was it uneventful─behold, three escaped cutpurses! I have just now finished binding them.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_022こいつらは皇都で盗みを働いた、ならず者……。
たったいま見つけて、縛りあげたところよ。

TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_030……何よ？
私の姿に、何かおかしなところでも？

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_Q1_100_030<tab>Is something wrong with Laurisse's appearance?
target: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_Q1_100_030<tab>ロリスの姿におかしな点がある？

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_101_031<tab>Nothing escapes <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, does it? It couldn't be helped... The rivets holding the plates of my armor together broke during the tussle.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_101_031……さすがに鍛冶師の眼はごまかせないわね。
いつもの鎧を着けていないのは、
装甲を留めていたリベットが壊れたせいよ。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_102_031<tab>You need not guard your tongue so. I know I am unarmored─the rivets broke during the fight.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_102_031……別に、気を遣わなくてもいいのよ？
いつもの鎧を着けていないのは、
装甲を留めていたリベットが壊れたせいよ。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_032<tab>It is not meet I enter the tourney without my cuirass. Yet the pay for this patrol will not cover repairs. And I cannot ask you to forge rivets for free.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_032大事な上覧試合までには、直しておきたいけど……
任務の給金くらいじゃ、修繕費用も出せないわね。
あなたに、無償でリベットを作ってもらうわけにはいかないし。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_033<tab>No matter. An iron will triumphs over all, as my father used to say─may Halone rest his soul.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_033ま、心配しないで……亡きお父様も、よく言っていたもの。
勝負で大切なのは「必ず勝つ」という気持ちだって！

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_034<tab>You may tell Fremondain I am perfectly fine. Now, brigands, up!
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_LAURISSE_000_034じいに伝えておいて、私はこのとおり無事だと。
……ほら、そこの悪党ども！　さっさと行くわよ！

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_050<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, did you find her? Is milady all right!?
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_050鍛冶師どの！
どうでした、ロリスお嬢様とはお会いできましたか？

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_051<tab>No! Her cuirass has...has...! Halone forfend, that is her only suit of armor!
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_051……なんと募兵に応じて、哨戒任務を！？
その上、一張羅の鎧が壊れてしまったですと？

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_052<tab><sigh> “An iron will triumphs over all...” Yes, Ser Jervaint was full of such sayings.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_052ふむ……ロリス様いわく、勝負で大切なのは気持ちだ、と。
たしかにそれは、先代のお館様の言葉の一部ですが……

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_053<tab>But what he actually said was, “An iron will triumphs over all─when steel armor defends it.” My mistress omitted the last part to seem strong in your eyes, no doubt.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_053亡き先代の口癖は、正確にはこうでございます！
「勝負で大切なのは、着慣れた鎧と、必ず勝つという気持ちだ」
さてはお嬢様、強がって肝心なところを端折りましたな！

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_054<tab>In truth, she cannot enter the tourney without her cuirass. Milady will need three bags of new rivets. Mythrite, I think, would be best─light and not easily broken. And of the highest quality, if you please.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_054ロリス様が上覧試合を勝ち進むには、あの甲冑が不可欠。
破損したリベットを、3袋ほど製作してはいただけぬでしょうか？
品名はたしか、「」……。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_055<tab>...I fear that I am still unable to offer you anything of tangible value. But please, a smith of your reputation would not deny us <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>, would you? House Jervaint remembers her allies, I promise you!
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_055先に申しあげたとおり、
お約束できる報酬は「名誉」だけですが……
お家再興のため、何卒、お頼み申し上げまする！

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_070<tab>Have you had any difficulty in fashioning the mythrite rivets, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_070いかがでしょう……？
「」を3袋、お持ちいただけましたか？

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_080<tab>Why, the craftsmanship is splendid, absolutely splendid! I can make milady's cuirass good as new with these. Thank you!
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_080おお、これは恐悦至極！
これを打ちつければ、ロリス様の鎧も、もとどおり！
その程度ならば、私の手でも修繕が可能です。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_081<tab>...And thank you for keeping the matter of your...er, recompense─or lack thereof─between us.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_081……いまひとつ、まことに厚かましいお願いですが。
どうか、鍛冶師どのに無償でお世話になっておることは、
お嬢様には、くれぐれも内密にお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_082<tab>I am not trying to deceive my mistress, of course. But I fear she may lose focus if our arrangement is revealed. Her mind must be on the tourney─and I will do all I can to keep her from distraction.
target:
TEXT_CLSBSM530_02008_FREMONDAIN_000_082いま、お嬢様の胸中を占めるのは、上覧試合のみ。
余計な心配など召されず、修行に励んでいただきたいゆえ……。
